data.text: Wet Wipes for Keeping Clean when Bike Touring
What is your favourite wet wipe solution for keeping clean when bathing is not an option and why? :)
Wet wipes are not a solution for anything.
data.author: Barry Curtain

data.text: Body wipes work fine but do not replace a shower. Use em voor your armpits and private parts, If really needed and plan a campsite with a shower half way .. its ok to stink a little, its allowed for hikers.
data.author: Martijn Gee

data.text: Wipes should be band like plastic bags.

data.text: Wet wipes are a lazy persons uneducated option and end up in landfill not breaking down. Wash yourself with a water bottle and your dirty T-shirt if needed.
data.author: Liz Charlton

data.text: Honestly my first tour across the US over 2 months probably included 5 showers and zero wet wipes. I really think a little tiny bit of Dr Bronners in the tiniest bottle is plenty but not even all that necessary to pack. All that being said, I would just find one that says they‚Äôre compostable and dispose of them accordingly.
